Class Trip

  • java.lang.Object
    • Trip

  • public class Trip
extends java.lang.Object
    An object containing all the information in a single trip.
    Author:
    max

    • Constructor Detail

      • Trip

        public Trip(java.awt.Point end,
            Passenger passenger)
        Constructs a Trip
        Parameters:
        start - The starting point of the passenger
        end - Where the passenger wants to go to
        passenger - The passenger who is requesting a trip

    • Method Detail

      • checkBoundaries

        public boolean checkBoundaries()
        Checks the end of this trip to see if it is within the 300x300 grid.
        Returns:
        true if the end location is within the 300x300 grid, false otherwise.

      • isSuccessful

        public boolean isSuccessful()
        Returns:
        True if the trip fully completed, false otherwise

      • getPassenger

        public Passenger getPassenger()
        Method to retrieve the passenger of the trip
        Returns:
        The passenger of this trip

        Method to retrieve the driver of the trip
        Returns:
        The driver of this trip

      • getEnd

        public java.lang.String getEnd()
        MEthod to retrieve a string of the ending location of the trip.
        Returns:
        The ending location of this trip in the form (x,y)

      • getEndPoint

        public java.awt.Point getEndPoint()
        Method to retrieve the ending location of the trip.
        Returns:
        The ending location of this trip in the form (x,y)

        public java.awt.Point getStartPoint()
        Method to retrieve the starting location of the trip.

        public java.lang.String getStart()
        Method to retrieve a string of the starting location of the trip.
        Returns:
        The starting location of this trip in the form (x,y)

      • getFare

        public double getFare()
        Method to obtain the fare amount
        Returns:
        The amount that this trip will cost the passenger.

      • transaction

        public boolean transaction()
        Calls a transaction between the passenger and the driver for the fare
        Returns:
        True if the transaction completed successfully, false otherwise

      • askPassenger

        public void askPassenger()
        Asks the passenger of this trip to rate the driver of this trip. Updates the trip object and the drivers rating list.

      • addDriver

        public void addDriver(Driver driver)
        Adds the driver to the trip object and calculates the fare based on the drivers location and the given end point.
        Parameters:
        driver - The driver that will take the passenger to the end location.

      • logTrip

        public void logTrip(java.lang.String filename)
        Logs this trips information into a file.
        Parameters:
        filename - The filename that we will write the information of this trip into.
